examples: I saw a little girl feeding, brushing, and talking to a heifer. Both girls were adorable!

definitions.definition: A woman , especially a young and often attractive woman.
examples: He has a crush on a girl at work. We were kidding with him yesterday about his work crush.

definitions.definition: A term of address to a female ( see usage notes )
examples: Hey, girl , I haven't seen you since last week! Where you been?
He lucked out with that girl of his. Smart, sweet, sassy, and pretty too.
Your girl turned up on our doorstep. She was crying about the argument on the playground. We let her vent.

definitions.definition: A female non-human animal , especially, in affectionate address, a female pet , especially a dog .
examples: Hey, Tricksy, come here, girl ! Do you want a treat? Yes, you love those biscuits, don't you! What a good girl ! Here's another!
Are you getting a boy cat or a girl cat?

definitions.definition: A machine or vehicle , especially one that the speaker uses often and is fond of.
examples: The old girl ain't as pretty as she once was, but she still purrs like a kitten and still gets out of her own way!

definitions.definition: A female servant ; a maid . ( see usage notes )
examples: He assumed that the girls should clean up his giant mess. We straightened out his misconception.
He's the sort of lowlife who snorts coke and refers to it as his girl .
Are your sure you want to discard that old girl ?

secondary_definitions: ( sometimes offensive , see usage note ) A woman , especially a young and often attractive woman.
( colloquial ) A term of address to a female ( see usage notes )
( especially with a possessive ) A female friend .
A female non-human animal , especially, in affectionate address, a female pet , especially a dog .
( somewhat childish ) (as a modifier) A female (tree, gene, etc).
( informal ) A machine or vehicle , especially one that the speaker uses often and is fond of.
A female servant ; a maid . ( see usage notes )
( US , slang , uncountable ) Cocaine , especially in powder form .
( card games , slang , uncommon ) A queen (the playing card ).
( UK , dialect , obsolete ) A roebuck two years old .
( obsolete ) A child of any gender.
